segments.text: Bang ? ! Bang ! Bang ! What are the Kings doing at seven o ’ clock on Sunday morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but what ’ s the banging noise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He ’ s standing on a ladder and banging some nails into the wall with a hammer . Now he ’ s hanging some strong strings on the nails .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what ’ s Mrs . King doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She ’ s bringing something pink for Mr . King to drink . Now she ’ s putting it ... OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He ’ s hanging from the string . He ’ s holding onto the string with his fingers and shouting to Mrs . King .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , she ’ s running toward our house . That ’ s her ringing the bell .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m not going to answer it . I ’ m sleeping .
segments.speaker: S1
